Event.title: Event
Event.description: Represents an event in the Chipukizi Hub system.

description.description: A detailed description of the event.

startDatetime.description: The date and time when the event starts, in ISO 8601 format.

endDatetime.description: The date and time when the event ends, in ISO 8601 format.

timezone.description: The timezone in which the event takes place (e.g., 'Africa/Nairobi').

eventType.description: The type or category of the event (e.g., 'Workshop', 'Meeting').

location.description: The physical location or online URL for the event.

imageUrl.description: URL of an image or poster for the event.

organizer.description: The name of the organizer or host of the event.

status.description: The visibility status of the event.

createdByAdminId.description: The ID of the admin user who created the event. Foreign key to a User document.

User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user in the Chipukizi Hub system.

email.description: The email address of the user.

displayName.description: The display name of the user.

photoURL.description: The URL of the user's profile picture.

AdminRole.title: AdminRole
AdminRole.description: A document indicating a user has admin privileges. The existence of a document at /roles_admin/{uid} grants admin rights.

definition.description: Stores event details. Public read access is granted for published events. Write access is restricted to admins.
Stores user profiles. Users can read their own profile, and admins can read any profile.
Grants admin privileges. The existence of a document here makes a user an admin.
